attributes.additional_details:
I believe same-sex marriage should be legalized. There are numerous amounts of flaws in why it is considered 'disgusting' and why it should not be legalized. Gays, lesbians, bisexuals and transgenders should be allowed equal rights.
I feel so strongly about this as I, a girl, wish to marry my girlfriend some time in the near future. Civil-partnerships aren't the same as a marriage, although they are both beautiful symbols of love.
LEGALIZE SAME-SEX MARRIAGE.
